1.content:
Here are the basic stories.

1. Body Swap
You come upon the ability to swap bodies. It works by thinking about it.

2. Possession
You awaken one day as a ghost with the ability to possess people. There is a copy of you in your body who has the power to sense who you are for some fun. The copy knows all about your powers and can even talk to you as a ghost.

3. Morphing
One day the wake up in the form of the person you were thinking of before you went to bed. A voice then tells you now have the power to morph into any person or animal.

4. Life Role Switch
You go to sleep one night saying," I wish I was (Insert Name Here)". You wake up in the person's life role with your body and you have the ability to swap roles with people.
1.title: Chose your story.

11.content:
Backstory:

Pretty teen girl Nell is extremely bookish and can't wait to move on to higher education, while her dim-witted neighbor and classmate, Woody, wants nothing more than to play football. When a class trip to a museum places Nell and Woody under an ancient Incan spell, the next day they realize something went totally wrong.

Who do you start as then?
11.title: Body Swap

112.content:
Nell had a long day at school and just finally happy she has alone time and can just relax, get into her pajamas and study for her test. Nell changes into a matching shirt and pants and sits down and reads her book as she begins to study...

Nell:Give me my Romeo, and when he shall die, take him and cut him out to little stars - and he'll make the face of heaven so fine. And all the world will be in love with the night -

Mystical: Shake Ya Ass

Nell: and... make the face of heaven so fine that all... the world will be in love....

Mystical: Shake Ya Ass

Nell tries to read the book and block the music out but she finally had enough....

Nell: ... all the world will be in love with the night... Excuse me! Excuse me! - Woody, will you turn that down?

Woody: Sorry, I can't hear you!

Nell: Turn the noise down!

Woody: Sorry, did you say something?

Nell: I'm trying to study but it's impossible with that racket going on!

Woody: It's not racket, that's Mystical!

Nell: Whatever it is, will you please switch it off?

Woody: What's it worth? -

Nell: The gratitude of a music lover?

Woody: Alright, I turn it off! .....If you flash me! Show me what girls are all about!

Nell: You are a pig!

Woody: Anyway, I've seen them before!

Nell covers her breasts...

Nell: What! You have not!

Nell closes her window out of shock and frustration but what she didn't realize is that her pajama top got stuck and ripped off. Nell has a shocked look on her face as Woody realizes and begins to laugh...

Woody: Have now!
112.title: Nell

1122.content: You laugh off at what just happened, Nell falls for your tricks every single time, you love messing with her sometimes it kinda turns you on. You sort of know deep down inside that at night time that Nell is very pretty but what am I kidding? I would never date a nerd! It was annoying having to deal with her on that field trip but now its over. Shirt is off, pajamas are on, time for bed!

I know you don't know me but you have a power to possess people. Use it wisely or just mess around. Good luck, my friend." You then woke up and noticed the dream you heard. You could try to possess your sister or you can wait till' school. What do you pick?

Sister of Mark(Ava)-http://www3.images.coolspotters.com/wall...

She's thirteen and likes to prank on you all the time. She might be pretty and smart, but she's one feisty girl. But then you thought how am I going to possess her?

13.content: Who are you? What are you like?
13.title: Morphing

131.content:
It's a minute before 7 in the morning. You roll onto your side to reposition yourself in your bed. Right at this moment you hear your mom scream from down stairs. "Jacob! It's time to get up!"

You slowly open your eyes until they're half open and move your face into the direction your alarm clock is standing. You pull it's plug just before it could start to beep in your face. "Ugh... Morning already." you groan as you sit up straight in your bed.

You walk over to your wardrobe and take some underwear from the drawer. You take off your pajamas and throw them onto your bed. Now standing in your underwear with your eyes still half open, you take off your underpants and put on clean ones. When walking over to your desk, where your other clothes lie, you stop in the middle of your room in front of your mirror. You notice your underpants not fitting as well as usual. You walk back to your wardrobe to get yourself a new pair.

You are back on your way to your wardrobe when you hear your mother scream "Honey, are you up yet?!" You, now fully awake thanks to your mother's sharp voice, reply with "I have never been more awake!"
Shocked by the sound coming from your mouth you freeze in place. You run strait back to your mirror, shocking yourself even more.

Staring into the mirror you realize why your voice sounded so strange and why your underpants didn't fit. You were looking directly into the eyes of the person you thought of last before going to sleep. You are looking strait at...
131.title: A boy

14.content:
Let's give you some background to this story.

Steven (You): You are a 16 year old boy who is in an unsteady relationship with your girlfriend, a mom who doesn't even know you exist, and a dad who is only around when he wants to be. You are also failing Math.

Christina: Your 5 year old sister who loves dolls and is the girliest 5 year old girl ever. Since your mom is focused on her newborn baby constantly, she nags you to do everything for her and is a spoiled brat.

Susan: Your 38 year old mom who loves her current youngest child so much that she does not care about the other people in her life.

Madison: The newborn girl your mom obesses over.

Russel: Your best friend. A very big prankster, especially to you. You also have to cover for him often.

Bradley: Your father who you do not know much about.

Candice: A gigantic nerd, artist, and your girlfriend.

Angela: The head cheerleader. Hates you and your girlfriend.

James: The head jock. Also hates you and your girlfriend.

Now onto the story:

After a long day you go straight to bed. You pass by your two sisters and mom. You hate being who you are. You just want to get away from it all. You go straight to bed and think of who you wish you were. You speak,"I wish I was _____," and black out.
14.title: Life Role Switch

144.content: Who do you wish to be?
144.title: Other

15.content:
5. Fusion
You have gained the ability to fuse anything together. You can also unfuse them. Your power also allows you to unfuse two things that were not already fused.

6. Wish Swap

15.title: List part 2

151.content:
Your name is Brandon Wright. You're an 18-year-old guy who sports brown curly hair, a slightly thin body, and an average height of 5'10". You've recently graduated from high school and before you'd set your foot out for your choice of college, you had four months of Summer to relax.

Or at least, that's what you thought.

After a lab experiment gone wrong in your chemistry class a few weeks ago, the whole class went up in smokes but luckily nobody was harmed, including yourself. Thinking back, you were the last the escape the lab room just before it went up in smokes.

Actually, it's better to say you escape the lab just in the nick of time as it went into smokes. Of course, you were able to pass unharmed physically and firemen came with their suits to contain any fire that broke out. The incident was quickly forgotten thanks to the fact that no injuries occurred but what you didn't know is that the smoke was the actual byproduct of a chemical experiment gone wrong and you were engulfed by it for just a few seconds.

You didn't experiment any harmful side-effects to be precise, but the only way to explain it is that you've been given abilities. With the touch of your hands, you can make any material, inorganic and organic, melt and reform. You can't reform material to something it's not as it will immediately reform back, but you can melt two objects together and create something entirely new. All you have to do is touch something and will it to dissolve, then using your hands, you can pull the liquefied object like a magnet with your hands.

Suffice to say, you've kept your abilities a secret and learned to control them by starting small and working your way up. You've melted trees and formed...a bigger tree? You've mashed an apple and an orange together to an "orple", which is surprisingly good.

But you've been careful not to test your powers on live humans. Upon merging organic material with no apparent deformation as well as merging simple inorganic objects, you're now eager to test your powers on humans over the Summer break.

So far, your test subjects include your family, your friends, and your neighbors.
151.title: Urge to Merge

1511.content:
Your family consists of five members, including yourself. You have a mother and father, Jessica Wright and David Wright, who are both awesome and supportive parents. If you could focus on one of your parents first, it would definitely be your mother. She's the CEO of a financial firm and is the primary income-bringer of the house. She jogs frequently outside and at 38 years old, she's definitely a looker with her slightly tanned and freckled skin, olive-colored eyes, cute button nose, brown straight hair cut to her shoulders, and if you say so proudly, her D-cup breasts are something that you're ashamed to ogle at especially when she puts on her jogging bra.

David is less physically fit, but not fat with a bit of a pot-belly. He primarily works as a chef of a restaurant he owns. Of course, he's the primary person who cooks in the house and he enjoys it, always finding a different assortment of spices and flavoring for each dinner. It honestly astonishes you. Other than that, he doesn't bother with any hair so he makes sure his head is shaved. To be honest, he almost looks like the actor Bruce Willis aside from the fact he's a little wider.

Finally, you have your two sisters, Melanie and Kayla, who are 13 and 17 years old, respectively. Melanie is still in middle school and is pretty quiet, loving to read books in her spare time. She sports brown hair that is usually tied up into a ponytail behind. She carries some of your mother's freckles and a cute face, but she smiles, it's always the brightest one in the house. As she usually spends time alone or with her friends, you've rarely hang out and usually left her be, but you'd like to think your relationship is okay.

Kayla, who is just a year behind you, has always been someone you could hang out with easily. It's not just because she's close in age as she's typically enjoys watching the same shows you do and has a simply energetic and always happy aura that makes you feel a little uplifted whenever you have a bad day. She hugs you a lot and also messes with you, testing your patience. Appearance wise, she will occasionally join with Jessica in her morning jog or run by herself, but she's always had a high metabolism where she doesn't have to worry too much about eating. That said, she's probably the most problematic in regards to not only testing your patience but also testing your teenage hormones. You aren't sure how, but her chest is bigger than your mother in the E-range of cups. She's proud of it too and you honestly believe that all the food she eats eventually becomes fat and stored in her chest. Other than that, she has fair skin, wavy hair that she lets loose, and a more elongated head.

That said, all the females in your family are pretty in their own unique way.

Who will you test your powers on first?
1511.title: Family

155.content: I'm sure I've seen this story thread somewhere else on writing.com, but I can't remember which story it was, or what it was called: You run out of washing powder, and you buy some new off-brand powder. This is no ordinary washing powder: the next person who puts on clothes that are washed by this powder, their body parts change to fit the clothes.

Your mum brings home some new washing powder from the store

1551.content: You are male. 17 years old, the middle child of your three sisters. You have one twin sister, one older sister (21) and one younger sister (14). Your Mum (48) works as the manager at the local supermarket and your dad (50) is a scientist/inventor.
1551.title: The Magic Washing Powder

choices: Mum tells you to set the table
Mum asks everyone to sit at the table
15512.content:
You are just finishing up the dishes after having dinner with your twin and older sister (Maria and Sarah, respectively) when you heard the front door open. You looked out of the door of the kitchen to see your mum enter the house, followed by Gina (your little sister).
"Hey mum," you said, as Gina ran up and gave you a hug, before pushing past you into the kitchen.
"Did you bring the washing powder?" shouted Maria from upstairs, as she began walking down to meet them "Our washing is pretty much overflowing the basket."
Maria and Sarah shared a room, but they seemed to use more clothing than the entire house combined.
"I got it, Maria," Mum said, as she handed off the washing powder. Maria immediately returned to her room, and came down with her arms overflowing with washing.
By this point, Gina had gone upstairs, and come back with a box of action figures (Gina, and to a lesser extent Maria, were tomboys) to play with on the kitchen floor to pass the time until dinner.

After putting her and Sarah's washing in the machine and turning it on, Maria sat at the table, and said to the room at large: "So, how was your party, Gina?"
"It was great, I managed to get a really high score, and I killed everyone else," said Gina, her eyes shining. She had been at a friend's party at Laser Quest.
"Maybe you should take up hunting," you joked, as Maria giggled at the expression on Gina's face.
"And kill all the cute animals?" she asked "No, not a chance."
"Just a joke," you said, putting your hands up.
15512.title: Your mum brings home some new washing powder fr...

choices: Sarah's (it'll be very girly, but what can you do?)
Maria (at least she has some clothes that aren't skirts)
155122.content:
"Guys! Supper time!" Mum shouted. Gina left her toys on the ground, and went to sit up at the table. You got up to help Mum with the plates and cutlery. Mum went to the fridge, and began getting out drinks, pouring them as you set the table. Turning round, you're just in time to see Mum trip over one of Gina's action figures, and the tray of drinks she was holding went flying, covering you with apple and orange juice.
"I'm sorry," Mum said, as Sarah and Gina started giggling "But look, the washing machine is finished, why don't you go and grab something of Maria or Sarah's, at least until you can go upstairs and get changed."

Our washing machine also had a built in dryer, so the clothes were completely dry and ready to wear. But who's clothes do you wear

You struggle for s few moments, but then manage to close the button. You look ridiculous, you're about a head taller than Maria, and your legs are a lot wider, so you feel the material digging into your legs. You think at first that it's the jeans cutting off your circulation, but as you look down at the bit of your legs you can still see, you see that the hairs are shrinking into the leg, until the part you can see is completely hairless, although this doesn't last long, as the trouser leg covers it up. You look around, and see you are slightly shorter, and feeling your legs through the now much more comfortable skinny jeans (although you did still feel a bit uncomfortable in the crotch area). Something weird is going on. What are you going to do?

Keep your shirt on, hope nobody notices your legs
1551222211.content: You take off the jeans, to reveal the legs of your twin sister Maria. You wait a few seconds, but they remain as your sister's legs. You try putting your own, soaking wet trousers back on, but nothing happens. You begin to panic. Maria was in the next room, and now you had her legs, without any way to get your own legs back. You also were starting to shiver, as your still-soaking top was slowly draining the heat from your body. For some warmth, you put your sister's jeans back on. Now you have a choice: put on one of your sister's shirts, and hope nobody notices, call your sister into the room, and try to figure out what's going on,Put o or keep your own shirt on, and risk getting hypothermia.

155122221112.content:
"Maria, could you come in here for a minute?" you called. Maria excused herself from the table, and came into the room. Closing the door, she turned around to you, and her mouth fell open upon seeing your legs.
"Wha-what happened?" she asked, her voice mercilessly quiet.
"I don't know," you said "I put on your jogging bottoms, and my legs turned into yours. I tried putting my joggers back on, but nothing happened. I don't know what to do? What do I do?"
"Maria? (Your name)? Are you ok in there?" Mum's voice came from the kitchen
"We're fine, mom," Maria shouted back, then went back to hushed voice "Calm down, (your name), there must be some explanation. It's ok, we're twins, we're about the same height, if you put on my top, you can pass as yourself if you don't draw attention to yourself."
"But I can't change back if I do that, Maria," you said "I don't want to be stuck with your body forever, even without the girl parts, I'll still have a girl's body."
"Look, the only thing that's different since you put my stuff on is the dishwasher detergent," said Maria "The reason you didn't change when you put your own stuff back on is because that stuff wasn't washed with the detergent. Hopefully people won't notice, but if they do, they need to know about this, anyway, what if something like this happens again? We can test if you can change back later, but we've been in here too long, Mum will be getting suspicious."
155122221112.title: Call Maria into the room

1551222211121.content:
"You might have a point," you said "I can't go out there shirtless, I'll put on your shirt."
He rummaged through the clothes pile, and pulled out a top, pulling it on. You feel your arms, stomach and hands change to mimic your sisters.
"Let's keep this between us for now," said Maria "Might be fun to use this in the future."
"I don't want you getting stuck," you said "At least wait until we find out if I can change back."
"OK," said Maria, hugging your now identical height body.

While washing your clothes, your little sister wanders into the laundry room
15512222111211.content:
"Ok, what happened in there?" asked Mom "How did you get shorter, and how are you fitting your sister's clothes so well?"
"Uh, we're twins, mum, we're similar build," you said
"Don't lie to me," said Mum "You've definitely changed. Would you like to tell me the truth, or would you like me to make you strip off right here?"
You sighed. "I don't know what happened, but when I put on Maria's clothes, they changed to match her body parts. I couldn't put mine back on, so I hoped you wouldn't notice."
"We wanted to make sure we could change him back before we said anything," said Maria "Sorry for lying to you. It was my idea."
"Well, until we can figure out how this works, nobody uses that new detergent," said Mum "Now, I think you should put a wash on, (your name) and use the detergent. If it works how we think it works, you should be able to turn yourself back."
15512222111211.title: Mum notices something is wrong

choices: Refuse- turn back your changed body parts
155122221112111.content:
While your clothes were washing, you sat down at the table as Mum had finished making dinner.
"You know, it's a little unbelievable that this detergent can change you, (your name)," said Mum "It's almost like it's magic."
"Magic?" asked your little sister Gina "Like fairy princess magic?"
"Think of it kind of like Tinkerbell's pixie dust," said Sarah "When some of it gets on your clothes, it turns other people so they look a little bit more like you. You see (your name) is a little bit shorter? That's because he's wearing some of Maria's clothes."
"So, I could be bigger?" asked Gina, her eyes wide as plates.
"Yes, you could be as tall as I am," said Sarah
Sarah was really tall, she appeared to have hit her growth spurt early and hadn't stopped growing since.
Gina immediately dropped down from her chair and ran for the laundry room, but Mum, who was nearest the door, stopped her.
"Not until you finish your vegetables, little one," said Mum, getting up to close the door to the laundry room.
Gina pulled a face "You're no fun."
"It would be interesting to try being someone else for the day," said Maria "As long as the other person was ok with being you, of course. I was going to ask if you'd like to be me, (your name), you're already halfway there, anyway."
"Does that mean I could be Sarah?" asked Gina, excitedly.
"I'm ok with you borrowing my legs for a few hours, Gina," said Sarah "But being someone else entirely, that's a big responsibility, maybe if you're sensible with my legs, I'll let you borrow other parts of my body."
There was a clatter, as Maria put down her knife and fork.
"Well, (your name)," said Maria "What do you say? Want to be me for today?"

info.brief_description: A bunch of swap ideas put into one interactive!
info.description:
This is my first interactive and i hope you all like it!

Rules:
No killing.
Sex is fine as long as it is not too descriptive and not continuous between chapters.
No ending the list created in the first chapter. If you do your chapter WILL be deleted.
Gay and Lesbian stuff is fine.
In a liquid-type possession stories your clothes become liquid, too.
Keep personalities unless that is the point of the story.
Keep story flowing, don't end it with -He got lost... The End-on the third chapter.
Use Good grammar, unintentional typos are OK.
Make the chapters more then a paragraph unless your adding to a list.
Have fun and enjoy!

I can delete anything against the rules or edit chapters that do not abide the rules.

The main characters in my stories will be guys but girls may add girl P.O.V.'s of other characters and girl main character stories.

Have fun and please add!
